scripts.:start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/server.js
scripts.setup: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.initSetup: npm i -g concurrently && npm i -g nodemon && npm i -g ts-node && npm run setup && npm i -g node-gyp && npm i -g prisma
scripts.android: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npx react-native run-android"
scripts.ios: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npx react-native run-ios"
scripts.android-studio: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npx react-native start"
scripts.android-vsc: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "cd client && npx react-native run-android"
